title: Forecast Demand for Seasonal Product
description: A supply planner needs to forecast demand for an agricultural chemical with highly seasonal sales to inform the production plan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the sales history for the product for the past three years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls historical sales data, showing peaks in the spring.

tasks.description: Apply a seasonal forecasting model to the historical data to predict demand for the upcoming season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a demand forecast of 500 metric tons for the next quarter.

tasks.description: Share the forecast with the production planning team to be used as input for the master production schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transmits the forecast data to the production planning module.
